name: RESCUE ATTEMPT #[REDACTED]
description:
ON AN ANCIENT AND HAUNTED TOMB-WORLD, A BONDED GUARDSWOMAN SEARCHES FOR HER LOST COMMANDER...

...the only problem is that her path keeps looping back on itself. Will she ever get out?

Run, jump and shoot your way across this dead and desolate planet to rescue the woman you are sworn to die for. Acquire enhancements to give you an edge over the undead horrors that bar your path. Find your way through the endless loop or die trying. How many will it take you?

It's time to start RESCUE ATTEMPT #[REDACTED].

Controls:

Move: WASD

Shoot: J

Run: Right Shift

Jump: Space

RESCUE ATTEMPT #[REDACTED] was made with LOVE2D in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47 based on the theme "Stuck in a Loop". If you also participated in LD47 and want to rate this game you can do so at its LD47 entry page!
